## objectEachAsync() function

异步遍历对象，返回 false 中断遍历

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function objectEachAsync<O extends AnyObject>(
  obj: O,
  iterator: (val: O[keyof O], key: Extract<keyof O, string>) => Promise<any> | any
): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                                     | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| obj       | O                                                                                        |             |
| iterator  | (val: O\[keyof O\], key: Extract&lt;keyof O, string&gt;) =&gt; Promise&lt;any&gt; \| any |             |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
